001// Copyright (c) FIRST and other WPILib contributors.
002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of
003// the WPILib BSD license file in the root directory of this project.
004
005package edu.wpi.first.apriltag;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAutoDetect;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
013import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose3d;
014import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation3d;
015import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Translation3d;
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.io.InputStream;
018import java.io.InputStreamReader;
019import java.nio.file.Path;
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.HashMap;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Map;
024import java.util.Objects;
025import java.util.Optional;
026
027/**
028 * Class for representing a layout of AprilTags on a field and reading them from a JSON format.
029 *
030 * <p>The JSON format contains two top-level objects, "tags" and "field". The "tags" object is a
031 * list of all AprilTags contained within a layout. Each AprilTag serializes to a JSON object
032 * containing an ID and a Pose3d. The "field" object is a descriptor of the size of the field in
033 * meters with "width" and "length" values. This is to account for arbitrary field sizes when
034 * transforming the poses.
035 *
036 * <p>Pose3ds are assumed to be measured from the bottom-left corner of the field, when the blue
037 * alliance is at the left. By default, Pose3ds will be returned as declared when calling {@link
038 * AprilTagFieldLayout#getTagPose(int)}. {@link #setOrigin(OriginPosition)} can be used to transform
039 * the poses returned from {@link AprilTagFieldLayout#getTagPose(int)} to be correct relative to a
040 * different coordinate frame.
041 */
042@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
043@JsonAutoDetect(getterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE)
044public class AprilTagFieldLayout {
045  public enum OriginPosition {
046    kBlueAllianceWallRightSide,
047    kRedAllianceWallRightSide,
048  }
049
050  private final Map<Integer, AprilTag> m_apriltags = new HashMap<>();
051
052  @JsonProperty(value = "field")
053  private FieldDimensions m_fieldDimensions;
054
055  private Pose3d m_origin;
056
057  /**
058   * Construct a new AprilTagFieldLayout with values imported from a JSON file.
059   *
060   * @param path Path of the JSON file to import from.
061   * @throws IOException If reading from the file fails.
062   */
063  public AprilTagFieldLayout(String path) throws IOException {
064    this(Path.of(path));
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Construct a new AprilTagFieldLayout with values imported from a JSON file.
069   *
070   * @param path Path of the JSON file to import from.
071   * @throws IOException If reading from the file fails.
072   */
073  public AprilTagFieldLayout(Path path) throws IOException {
074    AprilTagFieldLayout layout =
075        new ObjectMapper().readValue(path.toFile(), AprilTagFieldLayout.class);
076    m_apriltags.putAll(layout.m_apriltags);
077    m_fieldDimensions = layout.m_fieldDimensions;
078    setOrigin(OriginPosition.kBlueAllianceWallRightSide);
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Construct a new AprilTagFieldLayout from a list of {@link AprilTag} objects.
083   *
084   * @param apriltags List of {@link AprilTag}.
085   * @param fieldLength Length of the field the layout is representing in meters.
086   * @param fieldWidth Width of the field the layout is representing in meters.
087   */
088  public AprilTagFieldLayout(List<AprilTag> apriltags, double fieldLength, double fieldWidth) {
089    this(apriltags, new FieldDimensions(fieldLength, fieldWidth));
090  }
091
092  @JsonCreator
093  private AprilTagFieldLayout(
094      @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "tags") List<AprilTag> apriltags,
095      @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "field") FieldDimensions fieldDimensions) {
096    // To ensure the underlying semantics don't change with what kind of list is passed in
097    for (AprilTag tag : apriltags) {
098      m_apriltags.put(tag.ID, tag);
099    }
100    m_fieldDimensions = fieldDimensions;
101    setOrigin(OriginPosition.kBlueAllianceWallRightSide);
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Returns a List of the {@link AprilTag AprilTags} used in this layout.
106   *
107   * @return The {@link AprilTag AprilTags} used in this layout.
108   */
109  @JsonProperty("tags")
110  public List<AprilTag> getTags() {
111    return new ArrayList<>(m_apriltags.values());
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Sets the origin based on a predefined enumeration of coordinate frame origins. The origins are
116   * calculated from the field dimensions.
117   *
118   * <p>This transforms the Pose3ds returned by {@link #getTagPose(int)} to return the correct pose
119   * relative to a predefined coordinate frame.
120   *
121   * @param origin The predefined origin
122   */
123  @JsonIgnore
124  public void setOrigin(OriginPosition origin) {
125    switch (origin) {
126      case kBlueAllianceWallRightSide:
127        setOrigin(new Pose3d());
128        break;
129      case kRedAllianceWallRightSide:
130        setOrigin(
131            new Pose3d(
132                new Translation3d(m_fieldDimensions.fieldLength, m_fieldDimensions.fieldWidth, 0),
133                new Rotation3d(0, 0, Math.PI)));
134        break;
135      default:
136        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported enum value");
137    }
138  }
139
140  /**
141   * Sets the origin for tag pose transformation.
142   *
143   * <p>This transforms the Pose3ds returned by {@link #getTagPose(int)} to return the correct pose
144   * relative to the provided origin.
145   *
146   * @param origin The new origin for tag transformations
147   */
148  @JsonIgnore
149  public void setOrigin(Pose3d origin) {
150    m_origin = origin;
151  }
152
153  /**
154   * Gets an AprilTag pose by its ID.
155   *
156   * @param ID The ID of the tag.
157   * @return The pose corresponding to the ID passed in or an empty optional if a tag with that ID
158   *     was not found.
159   */
160  @SuppressWarnings("ParameterName")
161  public Optional<Pose3d> getTagPose(int ID) {
162    AprilTag tag = m_apriltags.get(ID);
163    if (tag == null) {
164      return Optional.empty();
165    }
166    return Optional.of(tag.pose.relativeTo(m_origin));
167  }
168
169  /**
170   * Serializes a AprilTagFieldLayout to a JSON file.
171   *
172   * @param path The path to write to.
173   * @throws IOException If writing to the file fails.
174   */
175  public void serialize(String path) throws IOException {
176    serialize(Path.of(path));
177  }
178
179  /**
180   * Serializes a AprilTagFieldLayout to a JSON file.
181   *
182   * @param path The path to write to.
183   * @throws IOException If writing to the file fails.
184   */
185  public void serialize(Path path) throws IOException {
186    new ObjectMapper().writeValue(path.toFile(), this);
187  }
188
189  /**
190   * Deserializes a field layout from a resource within a jar file.
191   *
192   * @param resourcePath The absolute path of the resource
193   * @return The deserialized layout
194   * @throws IOException If the resource could not be loaded
195   */
196  public static AprilTagFieldLayout loadFromResource(String resourcePath) throws IOException {
197    try (InputStream stream = AprilTagFieldLayout.class.getResourceAsStream(resourcePath);
198        InputStreamReader reader = new InputStreamReader(stream)) {
199      return new ObjectMapper().readerFor(AprilTagFieldLayout.class).readValue(reader);
200    }
201  }
202
203  @Override
204  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
205    if (obj instanceof AprilTagFieldLayout) {
206      var other = (AprilTagFieldLayout) obj;
207      return m_apriltags.equals(other.m_apriltags) && m_origin.equals(other.m_origin);
208    }
209    return false;
210  }
211
212  @Override
213  public int hashCode() {
214    return Objects.hash(m_apriltags, m_origin);
215  }
216
217  @JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
218  @JsonAutoDetect(getterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE)
219  private static class FieldDimensions {
220    @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
221    @JsonProperty(value = "length")
222    public double fieldLength;
223
224    @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
225    @JsonProperty(value = "width")
226    public double fieldWidth;
227
228    @JsonCreator()
229    FieldDimensions(
230        @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "length") double fieldLength,
231        @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "width") double fieldWidth) {
232      this.fieldLength = fieldLength;
233      this.fieldWidth = fieldWidth;
234    }
235  }
236}
